issue.title: [C++] Build Arrow adapter for Apache Kudu C++ client
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-814](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-814). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be useful to have an adapter that converts Kudu's scan batches into Arrow record batches.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-814?focusedCommentId=16982025) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This is still interesting, but probably the work should be done in Apache Kudu

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-814?focusedCommentId=17075215) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Did this just happen in Kudu?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-814?focusedCommentId=17075309) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
IIUC `[~tlipcon]` is working on this using the C Data Interface, would be one of the first "in the wild" usages of the C interface. I'll close this as "won't fix" since the work is happening externally to Apache Arrow
